Text.val: 29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed back Unicode to alpha for virtuals passed back from DSQL as char
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode
06.10.2006 AK SCR11825 fixed bug in SQL query

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE1' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':2' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE1' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':2' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE2 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE2' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':3' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE2' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':3' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE3 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE3' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':4' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE3' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':4' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE4 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE4' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':5' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE4' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':5' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE5 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE5' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':6' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE5' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':6' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE6 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE6' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':7' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE6' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO and BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':7' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
union all ------------ V.DATE7 ---------------
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE7' as char(7)), cast('TRANSFER' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_VALUEDATE <= ':8' and LGCD_DATE > ':9' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO union all
select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_CURRENCY), cast('V.DATE7' as char(7)), cast('BALANCE' as char(8)), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/BCNB on BCNB_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and BCNB_LEDG_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO --and --BCNB_VALUEDATE <= ':8' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO
order by 3,BANK_ADMNO,BANK_LEDG_NO,4,5
FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.valUnicode: Overview Bank totals by value date
